answers.answer: Hi!Chronic diarrhea in a two year old can be due to food allergy like gluten, milk, fruits, soy etc. Chronic diarrhea can also be due to parasitic infestations.  Other causes are irritable bowel syndrome, Crohn’s disease, malabsorption syndromes, pancreatic diseases, diabetes, hyperthyroidism etc.  Do discuss this with your son’s pediatrician. Take care!

question: my two year old son has diareah for two weeks now. stool was check no infectons given antibiotics and nothing has helped.please help me.
title: diareah
